channel.title: REEL TIME: UNDERGROUND REVIEW
channel.description:
Reel Time is a weekly film review podcast in which the hosts discuss, critique and rate the weeks biggest box office releases along with other various films, past and present, while offering an off topic, off kilter and mature, adult contented insight into the cinematic world.
http://www.rssboard.org/rss-validator/images/valid-rss.png
channel.itunes:subtitle: weekly movie review and critique done differently,
channel.itunes:author: REEL TIME: UNDERGROUND MOVIE REVIEW

item.title: Jesus F*cking Christ I thought 17 missions good enough
item.description: On a top secret mission to the moon three astronauts encounter thrills and chills on their journey to completing their mission.
item.dc:creator: REEL TIME: UNDERGROUND MOVIE REVIEW
item.itunes:summary: On a top secret mission to the moon three astronauts encounter thrills and chills on their journey to completing their mission.

item.title: 30 Min is Always Enough Time to Finish
item.description: 30 MIN or LESS follows Nick (Jesse Eisenberg) as a dimwitted, I-don't-give-a-fuck, stoner pizza delivery guy on his clueless adventure with Chet (Aziz Ansari), his foul mouthed best friend, on their racing quandaries of fulfilling a moronic mad mans insane plan to get rich.
item.dc:creator: REEL TIME: UNDERGROUND MOVIE REVIEW
item.itunes:summary: 30 MIN or LESS follows Nick (Jesse Eisenberg) as a dimwitted, I-don't-give-a-fuck, stoner pizza delivery guy on his clueless adventure with Chet (Aziz Ansari), his foul mouthed best friend, on their racing quandaries of fulfilling a moronic mad mans insane plan to get rich.

item.title: You mean the Apes dont throw SH*T!??
item.description: We all know or have herd of the Planet Of The Apes, right? Well the newest edition to the, we will say "saga", is The Rise Of The Planet Of The Apes, starring James Franco, and Frieda Pinto, at least as far as the human stars are concerned, in our opinion the Ape Caesar, is the real star in the film played by Andy Serkis. As you guessed we where surprised and kind of disappointed by the lack of poop being tossed by the monkeys, but give REEL TIME latest PODCAST a listen and see what we really think of the movie. COMMENTS ENCOURAGED

item.title: Holy F*ck! It's Captain American
item.description: After several un-successful tries of uploading this podcast due to a shitty internet connection we hopefully bring you Reel Times weekly review of CAPTAIN AMERICA: THE FIRST AVENGER. CAPTAIN AMERICA is a film full of kick ass qualities as it follows Justin Rogers and his world of tri's and tribs on his way to becoming the famed superhero.
item.dc:creator: REEL TIME: UNDERGROUND MOVIE REVIEW
item.itunes:summary: After several un-successful tries of uploading this podcast due to a shitty internet connection we hopefully bring you Reel Times weekly review of CAPTAIN AMERICA: THE FIRST AVENGER. item.title: Episode 4: Harry Potter 7 cast a spell on audiences
item.description: REEL TIME is a weekly group podcast, and This week we are doing Harry Potter 7 part 2 AKA Harry Potter and the deathly hollows part 2, the long awaited conclusion to the Harry Potter series, wrote by J.K. Rowling, with the screen play wrote by Steve Kloves. We at REEL TIME, will be giving our individual thoughts, as well as a group conversation about our opinions and maybe a little bit of bad mouthing amongst each other, so for the interest of our audience this podcast contains mature content and may not be suitable for all viewers. We hope that our podcast is entertaining, so as always we encourage any question, comments, or thoughts from our kick ass audience. THANK YOUR VERY MUCH AND ENJOY THE PODCAST.
item.dc:creator: REEL TIME: UNDERGROUND MOVIE REVIEW

THANK YOUR VERY MUCH AND ENJOY THE PODCAST.

item.title: Episode 3:Transformers Dark Of The Moon...Is it over yet?
item.description: Transformers Dark Of The Moon, is the third installment to the Transformers series. Directed by Michael Bay, starring Shia Labeouf as Sam Witwicky, who as you know is Autobots human connection, led by Optimus Prime and Rosie huntington-Whiteley playing Carly, Sam's new fling. In the movie Michael Bay further solidifies his abilities to make drawn out, over done action scenes with the Decepticons, who are trying to gain control over earth with highly advanced Robo technology,And the Autobots, who as always thwart the Decepticons plan for total domination, but not without a few twists. On Reel Time podcast we give our individual, uninterrupted views of the movie, as well as an unusual group conversation covering our similarities and differences covered in our individual thoughts. We do hope that you take a listen and see what we at Reel Time are about, and as always YOUR OPINIONS are most welcome as well, so please leave us your comments.

item.title: Episode 2: Bad teacher gets F
item.description: BAD TEACHER, directed by Jake Kasdan, follows Elizabeth Halsey, a gold digging whore played by Cameron Diaz, on her adventure of finding a rich man to take care of her. Halsey believes that a breast augmentation is the key to luring her "soul mate" but broke on her ass she attempts any con possible in hopes of raising $9,500 for the surgery. Along way she bumps in Scott Delacorte (Justin Timberlake), a trust fund kid and will stop at nothing to make him hers.
item.dc:creator: REEL TIME: UNDERGROUND MOVIE REVIEW

Halsey believes that a breast augmentation is the key to luring her "soul mate" but broke on her ass she attempts any con possible in hopes of raising $9,500 for the surgery. Along way she bumps in Scott Delacorte (Justin Timberlake), a trust fund kid and will stop at nothing to make him hers.

item.title: Episode 1: The green lantern can suck it
item.description: This is our first episode and we just wanted to get something out there for a start so it is very crude, it is called "The Green Lantern can suck it" and it is just our raw uncensored thoughts. Please check out our new show every week and see the improvements that we will be making to better suite our audience, so as always if you have any comments or suggestions about the show we highly encourage feedback.
